DataCapture - Class in billsplit.engine
 
DataCapture() - Constructor for class billsplit.engine.DataCapture
 
DataCapture(String) - Constructor for class billsplit.engine.DataCapture
 
debtAddParticipant(Item, Participant) - Method in class billsplit.engine.Transaction
Using this method ASSUMES that you want to split debt evenly between the participants currently assigned to the item and the new participant p.
debtAllEvenly() - Method in class billsplit.engine.Transaction
Literally splits every item cost evenly between all available participants.
debtGetItemAmountParticipant(Participant, Item) - Method in class billsplit.engine.Transaction
 
debtGetTotalAmountParticipant(Participant) - Method in class billsplit.engine.Transaction
 
debtItemEvenly(Item, ArrayList<Participant>) - Method in class billsplit.engine.Transaction
Clear any existing payers set for item, and then evenly split that item cost among the specified participants.
debtRemoveParticipant(Item, Participant) - Method in class billsplit.engine.Transaction
Removes a payer from an item.
debtResetItem(Item) - Method in class billsplit.engine.Transaction
For a particular item, resets any debt assignments made on it.
debtResetParticipant(Participant) - Method in class billsplit.engine.Transaction
Resets a participant's debt for all items.
